Description:
Premium Desirable Pocket, Superb Family Home or Investment
Located in one of the hottest pockets right now, this home has all the characteristics of a winning formula for buying a home or an investment!
A great location coupled with a home that is full of potential and charm. Today's comfortable living and tomorrows tempting potential will be at the forefront of buyers minds when they step into this charming home, sitting pretty on a generous corner allotment.
About the home:
-4 Bedrooms
-2 Bathrooms
-2 Under Cover Parking (Garage and Carport)
-530m2 Land (Big enough to build 2 X 20 plus squares homes if you decide to rebuild) STCA
-New Carpet and Lining in Kitchen area
-Private Yard area, great for the kids or entertaining friends
About the Location:
-In Clayton South's Hottest Pocket, central and walking distance to Clayton Central (Restaurants/Groceries and other specialty stores)
-Easy Access to Bus and Train Services
-Located close to Namitjira Park (great for the kids or a run/stroll)
-Minutes Drive to Costco, DFO, Chadstone Shopping Centre
-One of the strongest prospects for further Capital Growth
Insights: 14 Simon Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
A NEAT HOME WITH PERMITS TO BUILD A REAR TOWNHOUSE
In a quiet no-through road, this very neat original home is perfect for investors and developers with approved plans and permits to build a townhouse at the back. The home is in great condition with potential to renovate and add significant value with existing features including polished hardwood floors, a generous lounge/dining room and a neat kitchen with gas oven/stove. There are 3 bedrooms including the master with a built in wardrobe, a family bathroom and a separate toilet. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling also feature while outside there's a big covered deck and a rear set single garage. The plans are for a 2 storey townhouse with 3 bedrooms and a study that you can finish how you see fit and either retain for the bustling rental market or sell with potential for huge profits. A great position completes the picture with Clayton South Primary School, buses and Clarinda Shopping Centre all just minutes away.
Insights: 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

First Choice For Investors Or First Home Buyers
This lovely 2 bedroom apartment on a ground floor, which offers modern kitchen, 2 good size bedrooms with built-in-robes, spacious lounge, 1 bathroom and a carspace has roller shutters installed, it is a perfect choice for the investors or for anyone who wants to downsize or someone who is starting out,
Situated within walking distance to train station, moments away from Clayton Shopping Strip, and only minutes away from Monash University & Monash Medical Centre.

Description:
Better than Brand New and in Great Location - Under Contract
Amazing brand new renovation has brought out the very best in this spacious and light filled single level villa home. Located close to all amenities, including popular Clayton Shopping strip, Train Station, Primary Schools, High School and across the road from popular Keely Park is this fantastic property with all new top quality fixtures and fittings that will satisfy even the fussiest buyer.
All good size 3 bedrooms have large built in robes. Open plan living with floating timber floors leading to a great size family kitchen with all brand new stainless steel appliances and overlooking timber deck which is perfect for entertaining.
All this complimented by a beautiful family bathroom, ducted heating and split system cooling, single remote control garage and plenty of room on a long brand new driveway to park another 2 cars.
Low maintenance, perfectly landscaped front and rear gardens inviting for outdoor activities for young families.
All this only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and 1.3km to Clayton Train Station.
Ideal for all kinds of buyers. Inspection a must!!
Insights: 2/1 Oakes Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2019 and 13 other 3 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand New Townhouse in Prime Location
This quality built brand new townhouse in high demand location due to its close proximity to Clayton Shopping Strip, Train Station, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University offers great location and lifestyle.
Downstairs: Comprising large open plan living/dining overlooks low maintenance paved back yard. Family size kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and stone bench tops and powder room (2nd toilet).
Upstairs you find 2 good sized bedrooms with built in robes, study area and large family bathroom. All this complemented by top quality fixtures and fittings, split system heating and cooling and remote control garage with internal access.
Brand New Townhouse at Prime location, 15 mins walk distant to Clayton train station,
- 2 bedroom separated by bath room, more privacy,
- Powder room on the ground floor, total 2 toilet,
- Study area on second floor,
- Nice Backyard with shed,
- Internal access to garage.
Insights: 6/1 Main Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
GREAT OPPORTUNITY WITH RARE INVESTMENT RETURN
For the astute investor this home offers it all!
This brick veneer house offers you not only space and great location but it has also been updated to meet all your needs.
With spacious lounge and dinning, 3 good sized bedrooms, master bedroom with updated ensuite and built in robes in all the bedrooms. It has polished floor boards through out the house as well as gas ducted heating and split systems. Kitchen with meals area, updated family bathroom and large, lock up garage.
The potential to secure long term tenant on great rental return with minimum outgoings and many other extras.
Ideally situated within easy access to trains, schools, parks & all other conveniences.
Make this yours today!
For further details please contact.

Description:
FAMILY HOME IN PRIME LOCATION
Whether you are starting a family or an astute investor you simply cannot afford to look pass this brick veneer home sitting on a generous block of 720m2 (approx.).
Multiple options including future redevelopment (STCA), retain the existing home and enjoy the rental yields while you make your plans. Or enjoy this family home in its central location.
Set in one of the most convenient pocket of Clayton South. Situation just off Clayton Road and is within minutes to Clayton Shopping Central, Clayton South Primary School, Westall Primary School and Secondary College.
Featuring:
- 3 good sized bedrooms, 2 with BIRs
- Kitchen opens to meals area
- Spacious lounge and split A/C
- 1 bathroom & 1 toilet
- 1 garage and 1 carport
- Covered area at rear
An opportunity not to be missed!

Description:
A STREET FRONT UNIT IN A QUIET, COURT LIKE POSITION
As an investor, first home buyer or someone looking to downsize from a larger home, this street front unit in a court like position holds plenty of appeal. It begins with a location close to buses, Clarinda Shopping Centre and Clayton South Primary School with central Clayton and trains just minutes away. As the original home on the block, it retains a classic facade with some updates inside giving it a modern and comfortable feel. Features include polished hardwood floors and ducted heating throughout, a separate lounge and a meals area adjoining the modern kitchen with stainless steel oven and gas cook top. There are 3 spacious bedrooms and an updated bathroom plus a separate toilet and outside you find a private north facing courtyard that is easy to maintain.

Description:
Architecturally Designed Stand-Alone Townhouses
Another quality development from Bayland.
With proximity to Monash University, walk to transport and shops this Clayton South development of 9 standalone two and three bedroom townhouses is certain to excite owners and investors alike.
Our previous projects in the area have sold in record time with buyer confidence and demand already in place for this prime opportunity.
Visit our full display suite by appointment in our head office with fittings, fixtures, kitchens and bathrooms all available for viewing.
All interior fixtures and fittings have been exclusively selected by the renowned Black Milk ®
Interior Designers and feature stone bench tops, modern stainless steel appliances, built-in robes, large living and dining space as well as designated laundry and storage areas.
All landscaping surrounding these stunning standalone homes and common areas are exclusively designed by Merrick Hide Design.
Take advantage of the maximum stamp duty savings and the First Home Buyers Grant where applicable.
For more information please contact Cathy Lombardo on 0403 125 496

Address: 19 Bella Vista Crescent Clayton South VIC 3169
Description:
Charm, Comfort, Convenience
Located in the popular & quiet pocket of Clayton South on allotment of 580sqm (approx). This very well maintained brick veneer with the preferred north facing aspect and has the potential to further extend for your growing family.
The practical and well thought out floor plan consists of three good sized bedrooms with built in robes, master bedroom with en suite, kitchen & dining area, 2 bathrooms & 2 toilets, formal lounge, 4 air conditioners, ducted heating system, with beautiful views of the landscaped gardens and huge alfresco are perfect for all year round entertaining, double lockup garage with remote control and separate storage room at the back of the garage.
Quick access to the Clayton, Clarinda and Moorabbin area, Westall train station, bus stop, Westall secondary & primary school, Spring Valley golf club, Heatherton Park, Spring Parks Primary School, Springvale Plaza, Aldi supermarket with further easy access to Doctor Surgeries, Dentists, Springvale shopping complex, Library, Springvale Rise & St. Josephs Schools, Killester College, Childcare and all other amenities.
Here today, gone tomorrow.
Call now as this home won't last.
Sale by Set Date: Wednesday 15th June at 5pm (unless sold prior)
Photo ID Required

Description:
Start Making Your Visions A Reality
This residence situated on a generous 672sqm allotment offers outstanding potential for first home-buyers to just move in and enjoy this original and appealing family home, or the astute investor/developer to take full advantage of this property and position and develop into a multi-unit site (STCA). Well-presented throughout, the home's original interior comprises three good sized bedrooms, central bathroom, separate laundry, formal lounge room and kitchen/meals area. Also features gas heating for winter comfort, carport via side driveway, plus a simply enormous north-facing backyard highlighting the property's impressive dimensions and untapped potential. With close proximity to primary and secondary schools, including Clayton South Primary School and Westall Secondary College, as well as Clayton South Child Care Centre. A short stroll will take you to Westall/Clayton train station, public transport and Keeley Reserve. There are a myriad of amenities nearby including shopping centres at Westall, Clayton and Springvale as well as Springvale Homemaker Centre. In addition to having easy access to major roads and freeways, including Westall Road, Centre Road and Princes Highway. Monash University and Monash Medical Centre are also a very short drive from home.
Usman Maan : 0402 688 866

Description:
Excellent Opportunity To Start-out Or Invest - ONLY 1 YEAR OLD
With contemporary style and low maintenance ease, this modern streetfront townhouse offers a brilliant opportunity for those just starting out or looking for enticing investment rewards.
Impeccably presented, a smart open plan layout incorporates a spacious living/dining zone and stylish kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances, that effortlessly connects to a private entertaining courtyard. Optimum space is heightened by 3 robed bedrooms (main with ensuite and WIR) and the unique advantage of ground floor and upper level bathrooms. Split system heating/AC, study/4th bedroom, shed, water tanks and single garage complete an ideal package to enjoy an easy-care lifestyle or appreciate consistent investment performance,
just moments to Westall Station, local shops, Clayton Station, Monash University and Monash Medical Centre.

Description:
Modern Living in Fantastic Location
Unique opportunity for the investor or first home buyer to secure this great property in an ideal location. Situated within walking distance to Clayton Train station, Shops, Community Centre, Schools, Monash Medical Centre and only minutes from Monash University.
This beautiful 2 bedroom plus study, 2 bathroom unit features split system heating/cooling, down lights throughout, wall to ceiling tiled bathroom, designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances, splashback and dishwasher. All this conveniently overlooking undercover verandah and good sized courtyard and undercover car parking. For more information call Rene on 0413 330 357.
Insights: 1/1422 Centre Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Large Block, Perfect for Multi-Unit Development!
Land Dimensions 20.12m x 43.59m = 877sqm (approx)
Builders and Developers take a look at this great opportunity! This massive 877sqm (approx) of land is perfectly suitable to re-develop into multiple townhouses (STCA). The home is situated in close proximity to the Westall Train Station, Westall Secondary College, local shopping strip, Clayton Train Station, and only minutes away from Monash University and Monash Medical Centre.
The current solid brick home consists of 4 large bedrooms, 2 generous size living area, 2 bathroom, single lock up garage plus workshop/storage, ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout, which is perfectly rentable and does additionally offer the bones to create a family home on a large parcel.
With high re-sale values in the area and plenty of other development, this is a must buy!

Description:
Privacy, Low Maintenance, House Size, Keen to Sell!!!!
Sale by Deadline 24th of May @7pm (All Offers presented)
Calling out to Investors, retires or a home buyer looking for that something a little special.
Do your research, inspect the property and make an offer. This is a special and unique property that offers House size accommodation and a large block of land of 480m2. Sitting behind a modest but secured entry is this lovely home offering accommodations, space, features and living standards that will impress and captivate the most discerning of buyers.
Offering a smart and contemporary floorplan with plenty of natural light, provides for quiet and peaceful living. Although you are only minutes away from Clayton Central, Station, Local Schools, Monash University/Medical/Children Hospital, Springvale Central and the newly built Costco, make this an amazing buy as a home or an investment.
Special Features
*Solar panel - Feed rate is 25c/kwh (This will remain with the house) - Almost no electricity bill
No Body Corporate (480m2 Land/No Common Area)
3/4 Bedrooms (Master with Ensuite)
2 Living Areas (Or 4th Bedroom)
Updated modern kitchen, with Skylight
Ducted Heating/Refrigerated Cooling
2 Car Garage with Internal Access and drive through
2 Car Carport
2 Bathrooms and 2 Toilets
Large Private Rear Yard
An Inspection will impress and surprise.......

Description:
Alfresco living with homely warmth & perfectly located
Enjoying a peaceful location in a quiet court, this immaculate home simply sparkles with pride. It is bathed in sunshine and with glowing timber floors and ducted heating throughout, it offers entry into L-shaped lounge and dining with air conditioner and ambient electric log fire, stunning near new kitchen featuring Blanco oven and range with glass sliding doors opening to expansive covered north facing timber deck, ideal for year round entertaining. The comfortable interior also offers 3 beautifully bright robed bedrooms, pristine bathroom with bath and shower, separate WC and laundry with external access. Additionally, a powered bungalow/studio, garage/workshop, garden shed, abundant storage and plenty of off street parking ensures family friendly criteria in this excellent location close to public transport, schools, shops, Monash Medical and University.
Ryan Counihan : 0402 188 519
Insights: 9 Caringal Court, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.
